short_summary: Training for up to 75 participants with the option to increase by up to an additional 75 participants.
description: The purpose of this contract is to provide immigration, refugee security, and MPD training to various personnel. The training requirements include the following: · Canadian citizenship and immigration act: Providing an overview of act and its relevancy · Immigration and refugee protection act: Providing overview of act and its relevancy · MPD : Providing overview of act and its relevancy • MPD observation: Provide training to observation for MPD • Human rights and conduct: Provide overview of obscenities • Identity Theft • MPD MP 3.1 • Master Jedi knowledge • Combined weapons 1. Provided no proprietary or intellectual property
full_summary:
# Managing Successful Programmes Training Tender Announcement
**Title** | **Description**
-----------|-------------
Managing Successful Programmes Training | Request for Proposal - Estimated quantity of commodity: Managing Successful Programmes Training for up to 75 participants with the option to increase by up to an additional 75 participants.
**Reference Number**: PW-23-01021995, Amendment Number: 2
**Solicitation Number**: CIC-155632, Publication Date: 2023-01-18
**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions), Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
**Notice URL**: None, Attachment: [Proposal Request documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/18/5bf15acaf280f74169f98c9407ffa8e5/cic-155632_-_request_for_proposal.pdf)

## Background
Canada's Citizenship and Immigration (CIC) department seeks a trusted supplier to provide Managing Successful Programmes Training to up to 150 participants over the duration of the contract.

### Key Details

* Duration: Contract Award to March 31 2026
* Time frame of delivery: As and when requested from Contract Award to March 31 2026

### Requirements

Please ensure that your submission adheres to the format outlined in the Proposal Request documentation and response to the specified questions.

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: February 16, 2023 at 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: February 9, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

### Agreement on Government Procurement
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and so on.

### Contact Information
For more information or any questions, kindly submit your inquiries to [IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca](mailto:IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca) while referring to the Solicitation Number CIC-155632.

### Closings
The tender closing date has passed (Expired). Any late submission or submitted after the specified closing date will be automatically rejected. Related attachments: 
https://canadabuys.canada
